page.title: 03Health
page.content: Families in this area use various health centres.Most of them attend the Cupar one but several go to Newport. Hospital treatment is more varied. Ninewells Hospital and the Royal Infirmary in Dundee are used as much as the Victoria Infirmary in Kirkcaldy and the Adamson Hospital in Cupar.Most new babies are born in Forth Park Maternity Unit in Kirkcaldy or at Ninewells Hospital.A nurse from Cupar Health Centre visits the school and sees all children irrespective of their family doctor. The school doctor ,who pays a yearly visit to the school is also in Cupar. The school dentist from the St Andrews area visits once yearly in the autumn term.Treatment is carried out in the mobile dental caravan.Most children now have treatment from their own dentist in Cupar,Newport,St Andrews or Dundee.
